_header: And ye will please god greatly / Use privy penance discretely
Note: For similar series of precepts see 560, 560, 4810, 4840.
_description: Good counsel, including precepts in -ly — varying number of lines, a triplet and couplets

BodAsh59.First Lines:
Love gentyl Ihesu ferventlyAdversete take pacyentlyProsperyty
                    vse it mekelyHeven to reioyse þus esely…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…Nowe lorde Ihesu I crye þee nowe mercyTo do penaunce or
                    þat I hens dye

Bod393.Last Lines:
…Be sobre sad & chastAnd telle no wordis in
                    wast
Bod393.Note: Seven lines only; written as prose.

CULDd61.First Lines:
And ye will please god gretlyUse preuey penaunce discretlyAnd
                    deuoute prayers clerlyMesurably eate and drynke…
CULDd61.Last Lines: …And god schalbe godWhen goollde ys goon

BLEge1995.Transcription:
In mesure ete slepe and drynkeWake a monge pray and thykeBe
                    goodely sadde and chasteLoke ye speke noo wordys wasteAs ye wolde
                    chesse mete and drynkeSo ye loke to speke and thynke
